name: Hidden Objects Las Vegas Time
description:
Hidden Objects – Las Vegas Adventures is a magnificently designed seek & find game with numerous “Sin City” themed levels and fun Vegas items.

Tour Casinos like New York, Paris, Caesar’s Palace, Venetian and MGM, and visit Malls and famous Fremont Street finding hidden objects! WHAT HAPPENS IN VEGAS, STAYS IN VEGAS!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. An adventurous, quest challenge for Hidden Object fans!

Plus, fun objects to find amongst casinos, the famous “Strip,” hotel lobbies and more!

Hidden Objects – Las Vegas Adventures features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics with Las Vegas Themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels of Hidden Object Scenes
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Explore Sin City Vegas
Drag Scene to Search


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
4 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
4 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
10 Unique Levels
